title: Q14 Organization MC
prompt: Which sentence could be inserted before sentence 4 in order to <u>best</u> strengthen the paragraph?
description:
Read this paragraph.

1Ada Lovelace is known as the Founder of Scientific Computing. 2Born in England in 1815, she lived only 37 years. 3However, in that time she made some of the greatest contributions to the development of the modern computer. 4Though her work was somewhat obscured by the reputation of Charles Babbage, with whom she collaborated, Lovelace is now gaining well-deserved recognition as the first computer programmer.
feedback: The correct answer is, “Most notably, she wrote the first algorithm, or set of instructions, intended for execution by a machine.” This answer provides an important detail about the type of contribution she provided, as indicated in the previous sentence. The other answer choices present facts about her life that are outside the focus on this paragraph, which is about Lovelace’s contribution to the development of the computer. The fact that a programming language was named for her in recognition of her achievements does emphasize her importance, but it is outside the chronology of this paragraph and does not provide details about her contribution.
